#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll t,a[1000000],viv[2000000],n,i,maxi;
void made(ll index)
{
	while(index<=maxi)
	{
		viv[index]+=1;
		index+=(index & -index);
	}
}
ll solve(ll index)
{
	ll  ans=0;
	while(index>0)
	{
		ans+=viv[index];
		index-=(index & -index);
	}
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		maxi=-999999;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
		}
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			maxi=max(maxi,a[i]);
		}
		for(i=0;i<=maxi;i++)
			viv[i]=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			cout<<solve(a[i]-1)<<" ";
			made(a[i]);
		}
	}
}
